description:
go.tools/ssa: cosmetic changes to ssa.Alloc.

Remove its 'name' field and treat it just like any other
ssa.Register: it gets a temp name like "t1".

Instead, give it a comment field holding its purpose, e.g, "x"
for a source-level var, or "new", "slicelit", "complit" or
"varargs".

This improves usability of tools whose UI needs to refer to a
particular allocation site.

messages.text:
Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=fad1ebf513be&repo=tools ***

go.tools/ssa: cosmetic changes to ssa.Alloc.

Remove its 'name' field and treat it just like any other
ssa.Register: it gets a temp name like "t1".

Instead, give it a comment field holding its purpose, e.g, "x"
for a source-level vare, or "new", "slicelit", "complit" or
"varargs".

This improves usability of tools whose UI needs to refer to a
particular allocation site.

R=gri
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12273043

subject: code review 12273043: go.tools/ssa: cosmetic changes to ssa.Alloc.
